TopicTitle: Any plans for .91? Is there a .91?

Articles.Content:
I am just curious as it's been some time and I haven't seen anything about .91 and it's release. Understanding we have shifted to beta and releases will be different but I am still curious what we can expect.

And I know this is a "forbidden" question due to the legal nonsense connected to it but when can we expect this update? Months? Weeks? I simply want to know what's the general time difference now that we're in beta... 1 update a year? 2? I just want to know the new schedule for updates since it seemed like every quarter in alpha we'd get an update.

The official information about 0.91 started coming out last week, when SQUAD got back from their holidays. I imagine there will be more information tomorrow, and most if not every Tuesday until release. Follow MaxMaps in other places if you're desparate for teasers.

As for when it will be released: When it's readyTM. AFAIK, it's not against the rules for legal reasons so much as there's no point in predicting a release date for a game that's a work-in-progress and only available online. It will be released when all the targeted features are finished enough and the worst of the bugs have been resolved. There's never going to be an answer until it's actually ready for release, at which point, why delay?

Thread closed.
